display_long_description:
Endless Wonder is a colorful VR platformer filled with adventure, secrets, and a truly unique VR experience unlike anything you’ve seen before.

Embark on a journey through the vibrant, stylized world of Endless Wonder, where magic, magnetism, and gravity intertwine. Combine different sticks with special abilities to overcome obstacles on your path toward the mysterious Bone Dragon, who has kidnapped your beloved. Climb, magnetize, fight, and push forward through a living world full of beauty and danger.

[media]

Battle monsters twisted by the magic of a tyrant who has seized power over the kingdom. Challenge mighty bosses — each one a true test of your skill, reflexes, and creativity.

[media]

Every level is packed with secrets — from magical dragon eggs and hidden cards to vast secret areas filled with unique trials. Each discovery will surprise you and deliver an unforgettable experience.

[media]

Designed from the ground up for VR, Endless Wonder offers a truly innovative and immersive adventure that simply wouldn’t be possible in a flat-screen game.

[media]
